channel.title: Settingg up hostgator [please move if in wrong section]
channel.description: i just bought a domain name and host. can anyone tell me how i can upload files on to it. like i have dowloaded some fourm themes that i liked and i wanna upload them on to my website.. ?

item.title: Settingg up hostgator [please move if in wrong section]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

As said, they send you the email and such with your yser and pass. To actually have control on it. (editing this link is necessary) you would go to like:

http://yoursite.com/cpanel

Log in from there

Read full topic
item.source: Settingg up hostgator [please move if in wrong section]

item.title: Settingg up hostgator [please move if in wrong section]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

They send you an email with the login and link to the control panel.

From there you go to File Manager (or something like that) or setup a FTP account.

Read full topic
